MAN.TITLE: x_message

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : vector of characters strings to be displayed
: character string or 2 vector of character strings which specifies button(s) name(s). Default value is "Ok"
: number of button clicked (if 2 buttons are specified)

DESCRIPTION.P: for displaying a message (diagnostic,... ) and waiting for an answer (button click). The function returns only after a click on a button.

MAN.EXAMPLE:
gain=0.235;x_message('value of gain is :'+string(gain)) x_message(['singular matrix';'use least squares'])
r=x_message(['Your problem is ill conditioned'; 'continue ?'],['Yes','No'])
